channel.title: Ajax on Documentation for Umuzi Tech Department

item.title: Add a little Ajax
item.description: There is no need to create a new git repo for this code submission. This is a continuation of your previous work. a new static resource Create a new HTML static web page just like the form page you made before. You can even copy-paste your form’s html here. Usually copy-pasting pieces of code is a bad idea, this time it’s ok. Serve your new page from the following url: http://localhost:[YOUR_PORT]/single-page-app
